channel.title: Player Page Question
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Player Page Question"

item.title: Re: Player Page Question
item.content:encoded: i can't get my head band to show up for my village

item.title: Re: Player Page Question
item.content:encoded:
Here's how I did it on my page:

 [[table style="width:100%"]] [[row]][[cell style="margin:auto"]][[/cell]][[cell style="text-align:center;width:510px"]] [[image allies:annie/Annie.gif link="allies:annie"]] [[image allies:anonymous/Anonymous.gif link="allies:anonymous"]] [[image allies:big-bo/Big_Bo.gif link="allies:big-bo"]] [[image allies:big-ro/Big_Ro.gif link="allies:big-ro"]] [[/cell]] [[cell style="margin:auto"]][[/cell]][[/row]][[/table]]

With this syntax, it'll create a box 10 pictures across centered on the page. Just make sure every ally is on their own line, and you have a blank line between them. You can check the source of my page for individual allies as well at: Uzuki.

item.title: Player Page Question
item.content:encoded: How do you post pictures for the allies list in your player page? Could someone send me theirs possibly and I'll just edit it?
